This is a link without schema: www.google.com

This is a link with schema: https://www.example.com/hello/world

This line contains multiple links: http://example.com/dir1 http://example.com/dir1

This is a email address: someone@example.com

This is a mention: @someone

This is a mention followed by a link: @someone www.example.com

This is a link followed by mention: www.example.com @someone

这是一个法条: 劳动法第13条，《未成年人保护法》第134条

End of the sample file
